Title: You Can't Hide from the Dead
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Chris Kelley
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Chayton receives aid from an unexpected source. Gordon and Carrie break Deva out of a party. The night of the heist on Stowe's base arrives, but Hood's hallucinations with Kelly might put the plan at risk.
